```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(dichromat)
```

```{r load_data, echo = FALSE}
trout <- here("data", "siscowet.csv") %>% read_csv()
```

```{r exploratory_plot}
trout %>%
  filter(!is.na(sex)) %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>% 
  mutate(label = paste0(locID, "\n", round(mean(len),2))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sex, y = len, group = sex)) +
    geom_violin() 

```


```{r expository_plot}
pal <- dichromat_pal("BluetoOrange.10")(2)

trout %>%
  filter(!is.na(sex)) %>% 
  mutate(sex = recode(sex, "F" = "Female", "M" = "Male")) %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>% 
  mutate(label = paste0(locID, "\n", round(mean(len),2))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sex, y = len, color = sex, shape = sex)) +
    geom_violin() + 
  theme_classic() +
    labs(x ="\nSex", y ="Total Length (mm)\n") +
  scale_color_manual(values = pal)
```
